page.title: 12Religion 2; Upton Snodsbury.
page.content: St. John's, White Ladies Aston is mainly Norman with solid Tudor timbers supporting the bell tower. At this time the community is in the midst of raising a fnd of Â£12,000 to repair the tower. The list of vicars dates back to 1301. St. Michael & All Angels, Churchill, is a small church which is mentioned in the 1st. Domesday Book. At present it is a source of anxiety as it is very damp and in rather a bad state of repair. These two churchs are joined to the neighbouring parish of Peopleton where their vicar lives. There was formerly a non - conformist Chapel in Upton Snodsbury, but it fell into disuse, and converted into a private house some years ago.
